title: 166 How to Stand Out and Be a Thought Leader with Dorie Clark
description:
"Take control of your narrative. If you leave it to other people, they'll get it wrong." - Dorie Clark
If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes and more at www.lewishowes.com/166
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
